mapper.insert: insert into mem_stbl(memIdx,memID,memPassword,memName,memAge,memGender, memEmail, memProfile) values((select IFNULL(MAX(memIdx)+1,1)from mem_stbl mem),#{memID},#{memPassword},#{memName},#{memAge},#{memGender},#{memEmail},#{memProfile})
mapper.select: select * from mem_tbl where memID=#{memID} and memPassword=#{memPassword}
mapper.update: update mem_tbl set memProfile=#{memProfile} where memID=#{memID}
